notesStmt.note: Marbled paper slightly rubbed. Small delamination on front board. Damp entry at foredge with tidemarks throughout. Edges of first few leaves are soft, pleated, and torn. Some dog-eared corners. Worming and slight rodent damages.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
